statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET payment_amount = 1500.00, biometric_identifier = 'John Doe' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_date = '2022-03-15', payment_amount = 2000.50 WHERE biometric_identifier = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE transaction_history SET biometric_identifier = 'John Doe', payment_amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE transaction_history SET payment_amount = 750.25, transaction_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE biometric_identifier = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 101
UPDATE payment_details SET payment_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00', amount_paid = 500.75 WHERE payment_id = 201
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 15000.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-10', biometric_id = 'user124_biometric' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE payment_details SET amount_paid = 12500.75, payment_method = 'Credit Card', payment_date = '2022-01-15', biometric_id = 'user225_biometric' WHERE payment_id = 2002;
UPDATE TransactionHistory SET amount = 500 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE PaymentDetails SET payment_amount = 200.50, payment_date = '2022-04-15 09:30:00' WHERE payment_id = 2001;
UPDATE TransactionHistory SET transaction_date = '2022-06-23', amount = 1500 WHERE transaction_id = 101;

UPDATE PaymentDetails SET payment_amount = 500, payment_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE biometric_identifier = 'User123' AND transaction_id = (SELECT transaction_id FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000);
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE payment_details SET payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE payment_id = 3;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 500.75, transaction_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE biometric_id = 100;
UPDATE payment_details SET payment_method = 'Credit Card', payment_amount = 350.25, transaction_id = 1 WHERE payment_id = 3;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE payment_details SET amount_paid=100.50, payment_method='Credit Card' WHERE payment_id=456;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE payment_details SET amount_paid = 500, payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE payment_id = 456;
